title: SET_DISABLE_PETROL_DECALS_IGNITING_THIS_FRAME
content:
0xD9454B5752C857DC0xEAB6417C// SetDisablePetrolDecalsIgnitingThisFrame
void SET_DISABLE_PETROL_DECALS_IGNITING_THIS_FRAME();Prevents gas / petrol decals (aka gas / petrol trails and puddles) to be ignited on fire during the frame in which the native is called.Note: This native needs to be called every frame to prevent ignition.Examples:LuaCitizen.CreateThread(function()
    while true do
        SetDisablePetrolDecalsIgnitingThisFrame()
        Citizen.Wait(0)
    end
end)
